content: kkuurrrraajjoonngg hhaannddccrraaffttss ~~~~~~~~~~ one-skein one-der just one skein of pretty 4-ply yarn a spare afternoon and you ve got yourself a great little skinny scarf requirements one skein koigu kppm fingering weight yarn 50g/175yds 3 5mm crochet hook abbreviations english terms used chain chain space space treble_crochet treble double_crochet double_crochet dtr treble_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch pattern mesh make 32 chain row 1 1tr into 7th chain from hook *chain 2 skip 2 chain 1tr into next chain* repeat from * to * 7 more times nine spaces row 2 make 5 chain turning chain *1tr into next chain space chain 2* repeat from * to * seven times 1 treble_crochet into top of turning chain repeat row 2 until scarf is about 1m long or you have about a ping-pong ball size worth of yarn left ruffle tip work ruffle at foundation edge first then if you think you are likely to run out of yarn unpull a few row of the mesh before working second ruffle join yarn at corner and work ruffle along short end of scarf row 1 make 5 chain turning chain 1dtr into first chain space 1 chain 3times * 1dtr into next chain space 1 chain 4 times* repeat from * to * for each remaining space omitting final chain row 2 make 5 chain turning chain 1 dtr 1 chain into each chain space to end 1 dtr into top of turning chain row 3 4 chain 1 double_crochet into each chain space to end 4 chain slip_stitch into top of turning chain break yarn and draw through last loop repeat ruffle at other end darn in ends scarf will increase in length with blocking this pattern is copyright © 2007 to diane mulholland www kurrajonghandcrafts com
